title: Identify the Phase Change
text: Look at the graph and identify where the phase change from solid to liquid occurs. This is where the temperature remains constant for a period of time.

title: Read the Temperature
text: Read the temperature value on the y-axis that corresponds to the first plateau. This is the melting point of the substance.

title: Determine the Melting Point
text: What is the temperature at the first plateau on the graph?
